name: Steal Vitality
prereq: Spell Trickster Dedication; Ability To Cast Vampiric Touch
summary: When you cast vampiric touch, you can modify it to remove your enfeebled or clumsy condition.
description:
When you cast vampiric touch, you can modify its standard effects as follows: Instead of gaining temporary Hit Points, if your target fails or critically fails its saving throw, you can attempt a counteract check to remove the clumsy or enfeebled conditions on yourself, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC. If the condition was caused by an ongoing effect and you don't remove that effect, the condition returns at the end of your next turn.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
